name: maroloccio
summary: An easy-on-the-eyes dark background colour scheme.
description:
An easy-on-the-eyes dark background colour scheme.

Now with 256 colours support!

Screenshots:

GUI mode: http://picasaweb.google.com/lh/photo/InGod978VFzY144k3-ZrxA
cterm (256 colours): http://picasaweb.google.com/lh/photo/E5Nb1dltZxIoCtrFZ-OlnA
cterm (8 colours): http://picasaweb.google.com/lh/photo/j_VMoZ20KLJaTq2YYeAdfg

Download from:

Vim.org: http://www.vim.org/scripts/script.php?script_id=2480
Google Docs: http://docs.google.com/View?id=dd6g79bh_13f4gjx4nt
Easy-to-remember URL: http://bit.ly/maroloccio_vim

Please send feeback to the author! maroloccio[at]gmail.com

--
PS: Eclipse user? Check out this as well:

Eclipse colour scheme: http://docs.google.com/View?id=dd6g79bh_15f2jhs9f8
Screenshot: http://picasaweb.google.com/lh/photo/o7mWcx9G8TMXoU80S--_uw

versions.release_notes: Updated licensing and author's contact details to receive feedback.
Try it! Updated 256 colours terminal support!
Improved readability of cterm searches for dark backgrounds .
